attributes.action: join us to help us make xbox live free for all to enjoy, and to connect with everyone in the world for free
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Xbox live currently ranges from £35-£60. i am petitioning for the price to be wiped clear, or the very minimun to be reduced. this service brings gamers from all over the world, regardless of skill, together in a room, where they can talk about controversial issues, or just getting to know each other, this should not come at a cost!

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
